      • constructRayThroughPixel

        public Ray constructRayThroughPixel(int nX,
                                    int nY,
                                    int j,
                                    int i,
                                    double screenDistance,
                                    double screenWidth,
                                    double screenHeight)
        Get the view plane parameters and then construct the Ray Through Pixel i,j
        Parameters:
        nX - number of pixel of the view plane in axisX
        nY - number of pixel of the view plane in axisY
        j - the j index of pixel
        i - the i index of pixel
        screenDistance - the distance between the view plane and the camera
        screenWidth - the width of the view plane
        screenHeight - the height of the view plane
